@graph.name: Lightroom Classic Photo Editing Classes -Week 3 of 3 -18-11
@graph.description: 18/11/2025Coventry - Lightroom photo editing classes - Learn how to use Lightroom Classic on this 3-week course. From the organisation and workflow to editing
@graph.keywords: collections, composition, exporting, exposure, lightroom, photo-critiques, photo-editing, photoshop, Lightroom, photo editing, beginners-lightroom, Coventry

review.reviewBody: Alan is a realy nice guy learnt a lot. Very informative loads of information /  handouts for  future reference. Highly recommended.

I am new to photography and feel as though I got a lot from the course already.  It was explained in an easy to understand way and not too much 'technical' jargon for beginners.  Alan was very friendly and happy to answer questions from the whole group.  I am really excited to be starting the beg...
Excellent tuition with a knowledgeable instructor. Lots of tips, interaction and practical knowledge to help begin the photography journey
Excellent course that was pitched at the right level.

After completing the beginners course, I wasn't sure what do do next, so I signed up for some 1-2-1 sessions with Alan. His expertise and constructive critique during the first session enabled him to tailor a session suitable for me for No 2. We discussed black and white photography and concentra...

@graph.name: RPS Courses - RPS Distinctions Course - Enrol Anytime -1-12
@graph.description: 01/12/2025RPS Courses - RPS Distinctions - Enrol Anytime - Online Mentoring sessions to gain a distinction with the Royal Photographic Society via Zoom
@graph.keywords: composition, lightroom, photo-critiques, photo-editing, photoshop, rps, rps-classes, Online - Virtual Class - Zoom Meeting

review.reviewBody: I have recently completed a mentoring course with Alan. This was to help me prepare for a submission of a panel of work to gain my LRPS. I learned a huge amount in terms of composition, processing, technique and presentation and I am pleased to say I was successful in gaining my LRPS.

Alan is an excellent mentor. His honest, accurate critiques, eagle eye and meticulous attention to detail make him an ideal support in preparing for any photographic recognition  I unreservedly recommend him

I have done quite a few workshops and courses with Alan over the years, most recently the RPS course. Alan has been very supportive throughout and I have valued both his advice and very honest critique. I wouldn't hesitate to recommend Alan to anyone who wants to improve their photography.

@graph.name: Camera Courses For Beginners - Week 1 of 3 - Coventry 4-12
@graph.description: 04/12/2025Coventry - 3-week camera courses for beginners - Everything to get off Automatic mode and learn how to be more creative with Composition and Camera
@graph.keywords: camera-settings, composition, exposure, photo-critiques, dslr-settings, Week-1, beginner photography, photography for beginners, beginners-courses, Coventry

review.reviewBody: Excellent starting point for the novice.
Great course, Alan is clearly very knowledgable about photography and can help anyoneâ€™s needs.

It is clear that Alan has a wealth of knowledge which he conveys really well. He is also happy to answer any questions you may have, no question is a stupid one. Alan also gives great tips and tricks of taking the best picture. Looking forward to learning more throughout the beginners course and ...
A great mix of technical and creative content. Ideal for beginners who want to get inspired and learn practical tools to get started.
Really good introduction class for a beginner and I have a better understanding of the basic concepts now.

@graph.name: RPS Courses - RPS Distinctions Course - Enrol Anytime -1-4
@graph.description: 01/04/2026RPS Courses - RPS Distinctions - Enrol Anytime - Online Mentoring sessions to gain a distinction with the Royal Photographic Society via Zoom
@graph.keywords: composition, lightroom, photo-critiques, photo-editing, photoshop, rps, rps-classes, Online - Virtual Class - Zoom Meeting

review.reviewBody: I have recently completed a mentoring course with Alan. This was to help me prepare for a submission of a panel of work to gain my LRPS. I learned a huge amount in terms of composition, processing, technique and presentation and I am pleased to say I was successful in gaining my LRPS.

Alan is an excellent mentor. His honest, accurate critiques, eagle eye and meticulous attention to detail make him an ideal support in preparing for any photographic recognition  I unreservedly recommend him

I have done quite a few workshops and courses with Alan over the years, most recently the RPS course. Alan has been very supportive throughout and I have valued both his advice and very honest critique. I wouldn't hesitate to recommend Alan to anyone who wants to improve their photography.
